snippet: ECKSTEIN--Ruthann. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Ruthann Eckstein, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Ruthann's beloved husband, Kenneth; her brother, David Beer; her sons Max, Sam, and Zach; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: ECKSTEIN--Ruthann. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Ruthann Eckstein, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Ruthann's beloved husband, Kenneth; her brother, David Beer; her sons Max, Sam, and Zach; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
